messages.messageBody:
Cool! Sounds interesting. Thanks a lot. I'll ask him if he's ever
heard of it and share the link with him. Appreciate it...

Tina

> are actually backwards to us (start from back of book, read right
to

to
> English.

now...very

messages.subject: Manga...was Dang!
messages.msgSnippet: Can I ask? What is Manga? Adrian is into off the wall comics. Is this a comic? Never heard of it... If he likes off the wall comics, this is right up his
messages.messageBody:
"Can I ask? What is Manga? Adrian is into off the wall comics. Is
this a comic? Never heard of it..."

If he likes off the wall comics, this is right up his alley. It's
Japanese comics, and if you find authentic type publications, they
are actually backwards to us (start from back of book, read right to
left) the way real Japanese Manga would be...only it's translated to
English.
There are a ton of books showing people how to draw manga now...very
popular. You could find them at any Barnes and Noble if he's
interested.

Ren
